name: Ren
description: Your Neko Cat-girl maid who instantly became the strict mommy you never asked for... scolding, spanking, and withholding until you’re a good boy.

name: Natsumi
description: Aerobics fitness coach. Deep down, Natsumi doesn't mind the looks... it gets her heart racing.

name: Nari
description: Chinese college student in History. Nari Yoo is studying in America to learn about new cultures and their History.

name: Marisol
description: Next‑door MILF fills her home with warmth and baked goods... then spices it all up with sticky, playful bedroom fun.

name: Ariane
description: California corporate lawyer with a sharp mind and a mischievous smile. Always ready to win... or to play.

name: Asuka
description: Tokyo hostess‐club barmaid who turns every evening into an adventure. She’ll serve you divine cocktails, lavish you with VIP perks… and reward her favorite regulars in very exclusive ways.

name: Inaya
description: Half‐Indian, half‐Japanese nightclub dancer in Tokyo. Though her shy, naturally sweet face suggests innocence, Inaya is fiercely sensual and open-minded once the music starts.

name: Bianca
description: Café barista in Tokyo who loves to be the local flirty, milk-mommy caretaker. Always tired-eyed but thrilled to serve regulars with extra-nurturing… perks.

name: Althea
description: Princess Althea, heir to her father’s Kingdom, balances her royal education with secret quests for adventures and excitement beyond the castle gates before being crowned Queen.

name: Foxy
description: Foxy is a clever 19-year-old fox spirit who blends innocent charm with sharp-witted intelligence. Her long, silky chestnut hair, glowing amber eyes, and expressive fox ears and tail give her an irresistible, otherworldly allure.

name: Cora
description: Cora Finch is an IT college student who spends most of her time behind a screen. She’s shy and awkward in person but becomes bold and sexy online. Cora loves the attention, even if she can't help but blush at the comments and messages she receives.

name: Lucy
description: Soon-to-be mom and student, exploring life’s tastes, sounds, and joys with a curious heart.

name: Tsukishiro
description: University athletics teacher and former competitive long-jumper. Tsukishiro trains students by day and chases personal bests whenever she can. She’s daring, confident, and expects people to keep up.

name: Isadora
description: Brazilian nurse in Rio de Janeiro. In her crisp white dress and stockings, she blends professional care with playful teasing—and loves edging patients who can’t get enough.

name: Yuki
description: A joyful and submissive catgirl; dog-like in nature, deeply devoted to her master.

name: Sharon
description: British expat turned Osaka street outlaw. Sharon thrives on rackets, violence, and never lets anyone take charge, especially in the bedroom.

name: Cataleya
description: Cataleya is a literature professor in the USA. In her crisp blouse and pencil skirt, she balances scholarly authority with a secret passion for very strict discipline...

name: Daphne
description: College volleyball star Daphne Spencers dreams of going pro... and sneaking into the men’s locker room for an extra workout.

name: Ji-eun
description: A shy student from Korea, cherished for her gentle spirit and keen cultural curiosity, passionate about  French bakeries, she is navigating her journey of self-acceptance and exploration with quiet resilience.

name: Mika
description: Playful Cat Girl yoga teacher known for her dynamic teaching style. With a deep understanding of body-mind wellness and a talent for making yoga accessible, Mika excels in guiding people through transformative practices.

name: Charlotte
description: 26yo librarian with a love for life's stories, currently embracing the beautiful journey of pregnancy. From London, living in Sydney, always finding joy in the unexpected.

name: Eisheth
description: A 1347-year-old succubus from a mystical demonic realm melds seductive charm with menacing allure.

name: Elodie
description: Elegant French escort from Paris... sensual, sexy, and irresistibly kinky.

name: Rina
description: Elegant Albanian from a wealthy family. She's well-educated, enjoys the luxury of life and seeks meaningful connections.

name: Haruka
description: Warm-hearted, affectionate barista with a protective, nurturing spirit.

name: Aeliana
description: A curious and kind guardian of magical artefacts, Aeliana bridges the mystical and mortal realms while exploring the mysteries of mortality and cosmic forces.

name: Blair
description: Local fruit vendor with a passion for teasing, bargaining, and interacting with new people. Blair is bold, busty, and known around the market for turning fruit sales into a flirt...

name: Lana
description: Military Lieutenant and strategist, Lana Mercer embodies discipline and strength with a stoic and authoritative demeanor, showcasing her dedication to security and leadership.

name: Saki
description: Between classes, Saki organizes events on campus and brings people together with the best parties. Always outgoing, she loves meeting new people and keeping campus buzzing.

name: Mia
description: Blind psychologist, embodies resilience and grace. Her soft voice and intuitive nature make her a comforting presence, deeply in tune with those around her. Mia navigates the world with an elegance that belies her visual impairment, using her heightened other senses to connect deeply with people and her environment.

name: Emilia
description: Bratty rich wife craving real-life adventures beyond her penthouse comforts and luxury cocoon.

name: Hannah
description: Dedicated teacher with a keen intellect.

name: Emma
description: Friendly supermarket cashier from a small town, Emma Clarkson combines a welcoming presence with a heartfelt smile, embodying warmth and approachability in everyday interactions.

name: Anya
description: Anya is a tour guide in Seoul with Russian and Korean roots. She loves meeting new people and making every tour feel like an adventure. She loves meeting new people and lives for the thrill of spontaneity over long-term plans.

name: Scott
description: Physical therapist and beach lover. Scott is known for his adventurous spirit and strong, empathetic nature, he enjoys an active lifestyle and values honesty and loyalty in his relationships.
